h2_title: Red Boy Boss Fight and Guide
content: That being said, if you're lucky, you'll experience moments where he actually stands still for a few seconds, preparing to attack. Take advantage of these opportunities when they present themselves, to get in as many hits as possible before he starts a combo of fire assaults.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Boy.md', within the main section titled 'Red Boy', specifically from the subsection 'Red Boy Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
That being said, if you're lucky, you'll experience moments where he actually stands still for a few seconds, preparing to attack. Take advantage of these opportunities when they present themselves, to get in as many hits as possible before he starts a combo of fire assaults.
